entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Three Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.1°C

Humidity: 64 %

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
